Docs.summary: Enables a workflow service to receive data n the form of parameters. is interoperable with non-workflow WCF clients and services. The collection is similar to the argument declaration on a C# method signature.The collection cannot contain arguments marked with , or of type . Please use for these types of data.This is a sealed class.
